vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump offered Vladimir Putin U.S. help with Siberian wildfires and also threatened to withdraw federal emergency funding to California.
title: Did Trump Offer Russia Help With Wildfires, But Not California?
subtitle: Newsweek highlighted what it claimed was a conspicuous difference between the president's approach to Vladimir Putin and his demeanor towards Gavin Newsom.
author: Dan MacGuill
